Articles.Content:
To the mun with bill

"Alpha.. I see the surface"

"Copy that Phoenix, wait for the signal "

"Now, Phoenix start your thruster to lower your vertical speed!'

"On It!"

A couple of seconds later

"Phoenix, stop the thrusters and wait until you touchdown the surface, Over"

"Copy that Alpha"

After a hell of waiting Jeb felt the vessel touchdown and said one of his historic words

"Alpha.... The phoenix Has Landed"

The MCR erupted in cheers and cries as they heard Jeb's Words but quickly return as they need to monitor their screens and look for signals that represents danger

"Okay Jeb.. We need you to do an EVA and look for any damages to the vessel "

"On it Alpha"

As Jeb goes out of the lander.. He looked to the sky and felt small.

He went down the ladder and before touching the ground looked for any damages to the vessel.

"Alpha, there's no sign of any damage to the vessel"

"Copy, Jeb.... Wernher wants you to feel the surface... For Science, Of course"

"Copy, Alpha... The Ground is very dusty... Like sand in a beach or ash in a volcanic eruption"

"Copy Jeb.... Ok, your the first kerbonaut on the Mun... do you want to say anything?"

"I do Alpha..... This is one small for-"

The radio static but fix immediately

"-Kerbals, One giant leap. For Kerbalkind

As he said it, Kerbals watching the landing, erupted in cheers! The geeks saying that the mun landing was fake!! And the Kussians admitting there defeat in the space race!

 

 

Edited March 7, 2017 by MushTroqua
change Of content

Jeb goes to minmus

"Jeb, we need to talk" said Gerald as he looked into the window

"What?"

"We have to let you go"

Jeb, Suprised and angered asked the simple question

"Why?!"

"You see.. The Government is angry.. at you"

"Why?!"

"I don't know Jeb! The Guys upstairs said they got a call saying that the president personally asked, no ORDERED them to fire you"

Jeb obviously outraged went out and got his stuff when his friends.Bill,Val and Bob went to congratulate him when they noticed that he was packing his stuff

"Jeb what happened?" ask the trio

"I've been fired!'

"Why?! Just like that!?"

"Yeah, I mean why fire you when your the first kerbal on the mun!?"

"I don't know Bill! I just know that i've been fired and asked to leave the premises"

"Well. If they fire you. We're coming with you!" said Bill and Val

"Wait we are?" asked Bob suprised

"Yes, Bob. We are"

"Well if you guys want"

And this marks the leave of Jeb and the gang from the space center!
